job.title: Software Engineer (Remote - Front End)
job.description: vroom is an innovative endtoend ecommerce company that is revolutionizing the car buying experience our scalable datadriven technology brings all phases of the vehicle buying and selling process to consumers wherever they are and offers an extensive selection of vehicles transparent pricing competitive financing and contactfree athome pickup and delivery we have experienced tremendous growth and have become a disruptive force in the automotive industry vroom is an exciting dynamic workplace and theres no better time to join the team than right nowltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtrequirementsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt year experience building web interfacesltligtltligtexperience with front end framework such as react vue or angularltligtltligtexperience designing data stores and knowledge of best practices for state management w reduxltligtltligtgreat communicator team player and willing to go the extra mile leads by exampleltligtltligtpays attention to the details but respects and appreciates the processltligtltligtbsba degree in computer science or computer engineeringltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtpreferred experienceltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtexceptional decision making skills demonstrating deep understanding between building a product and writing codeltligtltligtfamiliar setting up modern client applications from scratchltligtltligtexperience with benchmarking and performance testing client heavy applicationsltligtltligtexperience with webpack and eslintltligtltligtexperience with node express and ssr in production environmentltligtltligtknowledgeable of seo best practicesltligtltligtknowledgeable of accessibility best practicesltligtltligtexperience w ab testingltligtltligtexperience w datadog and capturing performance metricsltligtltligtdesire to optimize ampamp improve build process and overall developer experienceltligtltligtexperience w circleci and building out cicd pipelinesltligtltligtexperience w typescript and porting over from javascriptltligtltligtexperience w parcel and migrating from webpackltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtexpectationsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtthis person will be expected to deliver quality code and challenge the team to do the same this person should be most vocal in meetings and code reviews but also very respectful of peoples opinions and not only understands but appreciates that there is more than one way to do a thing this person is also very self aware willing and open to learning from everyone this person is always presenting new tech to the team and driving the needle forward for the team to increase code quality code maintainability and team productivityltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtbenefitsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtthis fulltime role offers competitive compensation health dental and vision insurance a k plan fully companypaid short term disability long term disability and life insurance access to a healthcare concierge service with virtual visits and annualized days of paid vacationltbrgtltbrgtbut our biggest benefit is being part of a lowego high performing team thats transforming the used car market into a modern online and datadriven industry we are looking for people who want to be a part of a contemporary startup culture what gets us out of bed is working with talented people on a mission that mattersltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtcommitment to diversity and equal employment opportunityltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtvroom is an equal opportunity employer that is committed to creating a work environment where all employees can find their drive to do that we champion a workplace where each and every person is treated with dignity and respect and is valued for their unique perspective and contributions our values of speed service progress employees engagement and development are only possible in an environment where every individual has the ability to bring their whole selves to work and contribute fullyltbrgtltbrgtvrooms policy is to maintain a working environment that encourages mutual respect promotes harmonious and congenial relationships between employees and is free from all forms of discrimination and harassment of any employee or applicant for employment or service provider by anyone including supervisors coworkers vendors or clients harassment and discrimination in any manner or form is expressly prohibited there is no tolerance for discrimination or unequal treatment of any kind on the basis of race color religion creed gender sex sexual orientation gender identity or expression pregnancy sexual and reproductive health decisions national origin age disability genetic information marital status or civil partnershipunion status familial status military or veteran status predisposition or carrier status domestic violence victim status alienage or citizenship status unemployment status sexual violence or stalking victim status caregiver status or any other characteristic protected by lawltbrgtltbrgtthis practice applies to all terms conditions and privileges of employment
